summary: WINDSHIELD WIPERS TURNED OFF DURING INCLIMATE WEATHER ON A DIVIDED HIGHWAY.  THIS CAUSED ME JUCH STRESS AND COULD HAVE EASILY CAUSED AN WRECK.  AFTER HAVING WIPERS CHECKED OUT I FOUND THAT THIS IS A KNOWN PROBLEM THAT HAS BEEN RECALLED IN PREVIOUS YEARS.  I HAVE A 1998 CHEVROLET PICKUP AND BELIEVE THAT CHEVROLET SHOULD RECALL ANY YEARS WITH THE FAULTY CIRCUIT BOARDS.  THIS PROBLEM COULD EASILY RESULT IN THE LOSS OF LIFE.*AK
